data.actual_result: Discord sends the message but doesn't clear the message textbox.
data.expected_result: Discord sends the message and then clears the message textbox
data.short_description: Clicking outside of discord in splitscreen while typing, then dragging your finger onto the send button, then tapping the send button will send the message but it won't clear the textbox.
data.steps_to_repro: - open split screen and use discord with any other app, discord should be above - Type something in the text field - interact with the other app - hold down your finger and move your finger 1cm down (to be sure) and then move to the send button without releasing - quickly press the send button
